content: The Spanish Revolutionary News page " Serve the people " has published pictures of a solidarity painting for the prisoners of this year's LLL demonstration in Berlin. The painting was made in the city of Elche and bears the slogans "Freedom for the German Revolutionaries from the LLL march" in Spanish, supplemented by "Proletarians of all countries, unite!" in German. We document these pictures at this point.
author: rine
description: Internet platform for the development of a revolutionary movement
title: Spain: Painting in solidarity with the arrested of the LLL demonstration
tags: Freiheit für die Inhaftierten der LLL-Demonstration
